messages.subject: Re: The Meatrix
messages.msgSnippet: Diana, isn t that something? i viewed it from a link on simple living discussion board I visit. It woke me up to the way pork is produced in this
messages.messageBody:
Diana, isn't that something? i viewed it from a link on simple living
discussion board I visit.

It woke me up to the way pork is "produced" in this country...and I'm
not buying pork ever any more. It's virtually the same as veal, which
I've never knowingly touched, due to the cruelty of producing it. I
mean, the sows are treated the same as veal, and who the HECK knows
why?

ugh

blessings, HeidiC

messages.messageBody:
http://www.themeatrix.com/
The truth about where our meat comes from ~ very cool parody with a message.

diana,
The wackiest widow westriver...
"Great spirits have always found violent opposition from mediocre minds. The
latter cannot understand it when a man does not thoughtlessly submit to
hereditary prejudices but honestly and courageously uses his intelligence." ~ Albert
Einstein
